name: Building Onchain Without Compromises
description: This session will share the story behind the creation of Sky Strife and present a glimpse into our future endeavours. We'll take you through the developmental history, the hurdles we faced, and the player-centric approach that drove every decision we made. We will finish with an exciting announcement about what weâ€™ve been up to the past few months and what players can expect next.

speakers.name: kooshaba
speakers.bio: kooshaba works at Lattice and is currently lead developer of Sky Strife. Previously, he worked on Dark Forest as a developer and game designer.
